import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function AddProduct() { const [product, setProduct] = useState({ name: "", description: "", price: "" }); const {name, description, price} = product; const onInputChange=(e)=>{ setProduct({...product, [e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } const onSubmit=(e)=>{ e.pre } return (
